attributes.name: PublishManager
attributes.author: Ben Veenema <bveenema@gmail.com>
attributes.sentence: Caches Particle.publish events until the Cloud is available and limits to 1 publish/sec.
attributes.paragraph: PublishManager implements a FIFO queue so your Particle.publish()'s are published in the order they are created. Thanks to tiagonmas and JumpMaster for PublishQueue.
attributes.repository: git repository for the project, like https://github.com/bveenema/PublishManager
